inclusion.criterion: histologically or cytologically confirmed renal cell carcinoma
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: papillary thyroid cancer dx w/ right neck mass

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Metastatic to lymph nodes and adrenal glands

inclusion.criterion: component of conventional clear cell renal carcinoma
inclusion.label: unknown
met
inclusion.evidence: X-rays, scans, or physical examinations used for tumor measurement must have been completed within 28 days prior to registration

inclusion.criterion: no prior systemic therapy for renal cell carcinoma
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: total bilirubin =< institutional upper limit of normal
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: SGOT or SGPT =< 2.5 x institutional upper limit of normal
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: serum creatinine =< institutional upper limit of normal or calculated creatinine clearance >= 60 mL/min for patients with creatinine levels above institutional normal
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: brain metastases or treated/untreated brain metastases
exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: Patients with a history of brain metastases or who currently have treated to untreated brain metastases are not eligible

exclusion.criterion: ongoing requirement for systemic corticosteroid therapy
exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: Any ongoing requirement for systemic corticosteroid therapy is not permitted

exclusion.criterion: drugs known to be potent inhibitors of the CYP 3A4 enzyme
exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: Patients must not be on drugs known to be potent inhibitors of the CYP 3A4 enzyme as BAY 43-9006 is at least partially metabolized by this enzyme in the liver

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer and a history of brain metastases, which makes them ineligible for the trial.
